ygData.subject: Re: First time player
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish you well in your battle with leukemia, and am delighted that you can play this wonderful game during your difficult time. I was diagnosed with acute
ygData.messageBody:
I wish you well in your battle with leukemia, and am delighted that
you can play this wonderful game during your difficult time. I was
diagnosed with acute pancreatitis last year, which put me in contact
with many persons with the chronic form of that disease.
Unfortunately, most of them contend with too much pain to be able to
play EQ comfortably. I am most fortunate, as my treatment was
successful, and I have had no recurrence thus far.

Stay strong, play long.

Barto Proudfoot
Zeb server

--- In EverQuest@y..., CthulhuXL@a... wrote:
> On the fast leveling up thing, my diagnosis of Leukemia is
keeping me
> home until I go for my bone marrow transplant and I get to take my
computer
> to the hospital then too so I expect to level up out of boredom
mainly.
> In the words of Bart Simpson, "Smashy, smashy!"
> STM
>
> "Don't take your pineal gland for granted. Pamper it!
> Essential Oils! Rubdowns! It could save your ass
> someday."
> - Tlg'manh, Unspeakable Oath 14/15
